  • Constructor Details

    • DisplayWindow

      public DisplayWindow​(int leftX, int bottomY, int length, int width, int screenID)
      The standard constructor for class Line. A Line object is a line defined by the equation ax + by + c = 0, where a is not equal to zero, b is not equal to zero, and a, b, and c are all integers.
      Parameters:
      leftX - an integer value indicating the left x coordinate
      bottomY - an integer value indicating the bottom y coordinate
      length - an integer value indicating the length of the screen
      width - an integer value indicating the width of the screen
      screenID - an integer value indicating which screen is being used
